channel.title: Download filtered data option
channel.description:
Hello, when filters are used by a query it's not possible to "Download filtered CSV" and "Download filtered Excel" because the button is disable. Could you please tell me if there is some solutions? Thanks
Sam

item.title: Download filtered data option
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
This is because filters are part of the javascript front-end, and not part of the back-end. The only option here would be to use Query Parameters instead.

Read full topic
